data.persona: I am the local priest in the nearby village. Every Sunday I accept alms for the poor. I travel to neighboring villages during the week.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrifice Chamber.
Bones of the damned riddle the floor and every surface inside the room. Blood stains are rampant on table like surface, surfaces once used for human sacrifices. A foul, but faint, odor pervades even the most hardiest of nostrils.
There's a table, a pic axe, a temple, and a bone here.
The priest is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the wine to my quarters
data.mid_motivation: I plan to get drunk today
data.long_motivation: I hope to hide my drinking from the other priests in the coming months
